revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: The Attorney General directs me to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 8th inst. and to say that he has no official connection with or control over, the subject of pensions.
Your application should be addressed to Hon. H. Van Aernam, Commissioner of Pensions.
